description: I have used the Spring framework for several courses in my degree.  I have also used it for my current Student Information System side project.
I learned Vue as part of my job as a contractor for another company.  This website was made using Vue.  I also plan to use Vue in my current Student Information System side project.
I used Angular for a course project that can be found on my home page.  Angular uses TypeScript, which is an extension of JavaScript.
I have used MySQL for a couple course projects, and I currently run it on my machine.
I have used PostgreSQL for a couple course projects.  I have experience making custom procedures and triggers.
I have used SQLite as part of my Android projects for courses (one of those projects is on my home page).  I have also used SQLite in a recent contact form API project for a client.
